projects.title: Helix LMS Cloud
projects.summary: Multi-tenant learning management platform where Next.js orchestration, Node.js/Express.js services, and PostgreSQL/GraphQL APIs deliver SCORM ingestion, cohort management, and AI copilots for instructors.

projects.title: Orion Simulation Control
projects.summary: Simulation and digital-twin control room powering real-time telemetry playback for manufacturing labs using React, Three.js, Socket.io streams, and Kafka-backed microservices deployed on Kubernetes.

projects.title: PulseCare Telehealth Platform
projects.summary: Full-stack healthcare suite with secure RESTful APIs, HIPAA-ready workflows, and AI triage assistants built on Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Docker, and real-time Socket.io consultations.

projects.title: Flowcast Analytics
projects.summary: Event-driven analytics fabric blending React dashboards, SQL-based transformations, and Hasura GraphQL APIs over MySQL to surface predictive insights for ops teams.

projects.title: Nebula Research Portal
projects.summary: Knowledge base and experiment tracker coupling React motion canvases with Supabase, GraphQL, and AWS Bedrock AI integrations to summarize lab results for distributed R&D teams.

projects.title: Atlas Product Ops
projects.summary: Operations cockpit with AI-assisted meeting notes, GraphQL + REST services, and PostgreSQL event sourcing distributed through Kafka topics for business-critical automations.

projects.title: Waveform Commerce
projects.summary: Headless commerce starter powering B2B marketplaces with Remix, Stripe, and domain-driven services backed by MySQL and Redis, all containerized with Docker for fast rollouts.

projects.title: Lumen SimLab
projects.summary: Web-based simulation lab used for onboarding field engineers; blends React-powered UIs, WebGL scenes, MongoDB models, and GraphQL/REST gateways with AI-generated scenarios.
